content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If your system joins EPAM domain or is connected to EPAM network, you should obtain the digital certificate automatically.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is important to create a backup (*.pfx file) of all your private certificates (e.g., if you have just renewed your expiring certificate) in case the original one is lost or corrupted (e.g., your operating system is reinstalled, or the hard drive crashes). Create a backup of your digital certificate by performing the steps described in WI “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/pal_method_plugin/guidances/whitepapers/doc_WIIT_DataEncryptionandDigitalSigning_4D0130B6.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Encryption and Digital Signing instruction\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”, p. 2.3 Creating backup of your private certificate for Windows computers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
